abstract.para: The &ostack; project provides a variety of command line tools with which you can manage the services within your cloud. The command line interface also allows for automation of administration tasks as you can use the command in scripts. Each ? of the core &ostack; services has its own command line tool: for example, use keystone for managing users and projects, nova for managing instances and flavors, or glance for managing images.

sect1.title: Managing Images
sect1.para: Images can only be uploaded to &productname; with the glance line tool. As the &ostack; project currently aims to unify the multiple command line tools, there are currently two divergent variants of the glance command available: the older one is contained in the package openstack-glance, the newer one in the package python_glanceclient. You cannot install both packages in parallel. This manual describes the use of the glance variant that is contained in openstack-glance.

sect2.title: Building Images with &susestudio;
sect2.para: To build the images to use within the cloud, use &susestudio; or &suseonsite;.
